text: A car driver was murdered by a duo at Alagapuri near Uppiliyapuram on Tuesday. The driver G. Gopinath was sleeping in his house when the duo - Pratap and his friend Chandru - allegedly attacked him with an aruval. Police said Pratap’s sister had fallen in love with a man of Pachaperumalpatti village and married him. Suspecting that Gopinath had helped Brindha in her love marriage, Pratap reportedly developed a grudge against Gopinath and allegedly committed the murder, the police said. The two escaped after committing the murder. The Thuraiyur police have registered a case.
title: Car driver murdered
